a.title: Bergen County Board of Social Services
a.span: Bergen County Board of Social Services

li.a: Bergen County Board of Social Services

p.br: The Glen Rock School District is well known for its engaging and well-rounded academics taught by exceptional teachers in a collaborative environment. Students are encouraged to grow and explore. View more

Sportsmanship and leadership have led Glen Rock teams to achieve greatness. Our athletes are dedicated and take great pride in their sport. A variety of sports are offered each season.
View more

Each school has their own Home and School Association. HSA hosts events for parents and children throughout the year. HSA raises funds and makes donations to assist with the growth of programs. Get involved
A demographic study was conducted for Glen Rock Public Schools. Learn more about the district demographic findings and projections

div.span: Read More About Board Meeting Highlights for April 14

div.p: Founded on principles of education, in partnership with a supportive community, providing exceptional education to all students to cultivate resilient, responsible and engaged global citizens
